casebody.data:
James MONTAG, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
BOROUGH OF HO-HO-KUS, Steven Shell, individually and in his official capacity as councilman for the Borough of Ho-Ho-Kus, Defendants-Petitioners. C-437 September Term 2017
080057 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 13, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005315-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
